meanings.definition: The state of residing in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Her residency in the small town brought her much joy.
meanings.sent2: His residency in the city allowed him to easily access all amenities.
meanings.sent3: During her residency in the countryside, she discovered a love for nature.
meanings.sent4: His residency in the bustling metropolis was like being in a constant whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The residency in the cozy cottage felt like a warm embrace.

meanings.definition: The act of residing or living in a place.
meanings.sent1: Their residency in the mountains was filled with peace and tranquility.
meanings.sent2: The residency in the beach house was a dream come true for the family.
meanings.sent3: The residency in the haunted mansion turned out to be quite an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His residency in the dormitory felt like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The residency in the treehouse was a magical experience for the children.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which one resides in a place.
meanings.sent1: His residency in the apartment lasted for two years.
meanings.sent2: During her residency in the countryside, she learned to appreciate the simple life.
meanings.sent3: The residency in the hotel felt like a never-ending vacation.
meanings.sent4: His residency in the foreign country broadened his perspective.
meanings.sent5: The residency in the old mansion was filled with mysterious occurrences.

meanings.definition: The official position or status of being a resident in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Obtaining residency in the new country was a long process.
meanings.sent2: His residency in the community allowed him to participate in local events.
meanings.sent3: The residency in the exclusive neighborhood came with many privileges.
meanings.sent4: Her residency in the prestigious university opened up many opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The residency in the historic town made him feel connected to the past.
